titleStmt.title: An account of a disputation at Oxford, anno dom. 1554 with A treatise of the Blessed Sacrament / both written by Bishop Ridley, martyr ; to which is added a letter written by Mr. John Bradford, never before printed all taken out of an orig[i]nal manuscript.
titleStmt.author: Ridley, Nicholas, 1500?-1555.

titleStmt.title: An account of a disputation at Oxford, anno dom. 1554 with A treatise of the Blessed Sacrament / both written by Bishop Ridley, martyr ; to which is added a letter written by Mr. John Bradford, never before printed all taken out of an orig[i]nal manuscript.
titleStmt.author: Ridley, Nicholas, 1500?-1555.

notesStmt.note: "Disputation" is in Latin with preface in English and Latin. "Treatise of the Blessed Sacrament" and "A letter" are in English.
"Anglican tracts attacking Roman catholicism"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
